com.nfcalarmclock

Class NacHeightAnimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.animation.Animator
      • android.animation.ValueAnimator
        • com.nfcalarmclock.animator.NacHeightAnimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.animation.ValueAnimator.AnimatorUpdateListener, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class NacHeightAnimator
extends android.animation.ValueAnimator
implements android.animation.ValueAnimator.AnimatorUpdateListener
    Animator to expand or collapse a view.

    • Nested Class Summary
